name: TrumpNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Donald Trump produces news faster than any other president in US history. As a consumer, you probably want to remain up to date on all the relevant happenings. Activate this skill by saying something like "Alexa what's my flash briefing?", and Alexa will detail news from the National Post rss feed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
